title: Everybody Knows That You Are Insane

song.full_title: Everybody Knows That You Are Insane by Queens of the Stone Age
song.title: Everybody Knows That You Are Insane
song.title_with_featured: Everybody Knows That You Are Insane
song.lyrics:
Everybody Knows That You Are Insane Lyrics[Verse 1]
You wanna know why you feel so hollow?
'Cause you are
You're missing out, well, if you say so
Then you're missing out

[Chorus]
Everybody knows that you're insane
Everybody knows that you're insane

[Verse 2]
You wanna know just how long you can hide from
What you are, not very long
I have been lost, down every road I follow
Out in the dark and on my way home
[Chorus]
Everybody knows that you're insane
Everybody knows that you're insane
Everybody knows that you're insane
Everybody knows that you're insane

[Guitar Solo: Troy Van Leeuwen]

[Bridge]
And I feel nothing, am I better yet?
And I feel nothing, am I better yet?
And I feel nothing, am I better yet?
And I feel nothing, am I better yet?

[Chorus]
Everybody knows that you're insane
Everybody knows that you're insane
Everybody knows that you're insane
Everybody knows that you're insaneYou might also like4Embed
